text:
:wave: Hey team! Need some help with text overflow in a Select component

*Current Behavior:*
- Using a Select component from UI Extensions for CIIU options
- Long option labels are causing overflow issues despite using overflow and word break properties

*Current Implementation:*
```jsx
<Select
  label="CIIU a suscribir"
  placeholder="Seleccione CIIU"
  value={ciiu}
  onChange={(value) => setCiiu(value)}
  required={true}
  options={ciiuOptions}
/>

_What I've Tried:_
• Added overflowWrap: "break-word"
• Added wordBreak: "break-word"
• Set whiteSpace: "normal"
_Question:_ Has anyone dealt with this before? Any suggestions for handling long text in Select options properly?

Reminder: Don’t forget to keep your HubSpot CLI up to date to ensure you have the latest CLI features, bug/usability fixes and performance improvements. • <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#upgrade|How to upgrade your CLI to the latest version>.
